Tuscaloosa.Alberta City, Tuscaloosa: Alberta City is a suburban area of Tuscaloosa, Alabama. Alberta city is located in the northeastern area of Tuscaloosa, Alabama, United States. The area is generally defined as encompassing the portions of the city east of U.S. Route 82 (McFarland Boulevard), west of Holt, south of the Black Warrior River and north of Veterans Memorial Parkway.
